item.description:
Welcome to the newly formed
Western MA PUG Meetup group!

We hope you will be able to join our monthly meetup, in order to meet other pugs and pug parents and give our little ones time to play and socialize.

We meet the first weekend of the month - either saturday or sunday. For now, our meetups are held at a private residence - the home of Milo (1 year old) and Binxy (6 years old). We have a large fenced-in backyard, so the pups can run around without worry. As the weather gets colder, we'll be looking for an indoor venue.


Looking forward to meeting you and your pugs!


-Marianna
Organizer
item.name: Western MA Pug October Meetup
